-- | Provides off-chain and on-chain interoperability tools for YTxP pattern implementations
--   
--   Provides off-chain and on-chain interoperability tools for YTxP
--   pattern implementations
@package ytxp-sdk
@version 0.2.0

module Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers

-- | Represents an index into a authorised reference script in a
--   TxInReferenceInput list
newtype AuthorisedScriptIndex
AuthorisedScriptIndex :: Integer -> AuthorisedScriptIndex
data AuthorisedScriptPurpose
Minting :: AuthorisedScriptPurpose
Spending :: AuthorisedScriptPurpose
Rewarding :: AuthorisedScriptPurpose
newtype AuthorisedScriptProofIndex
AuthorisedScriptProofIndex :: (AuthorisedScriptPurpose, Integer) -> AuthorisedScriptProofIndex

-- | The redeemer passed to the yielding minting policy, validator, and
--   staking validators
data YieldingRedeemer
YieldingRedeemer :: AuthorisedScriptIndex -> AuthorisedScriptProofIndex -> YieldingRedeemer

-- | Integer The index of the TxInReferenceInput that contains the
--   authorised reference script.
[$sel:authorisedScriptIndex:YieldingRedeemer] :: YieldingRedeemer -> AuthorisedScriptIndex

-- | A tuple containing yielded to script type and the index at which to
--   find proof: this allows us to avoid having to loop through
--   inputs<i>mints</i>withdrawls to find the script we want to ensure is
--   run.
[$sel:authorisedScriptProofIndex:YieldingRedeemer] :: YieldingRedeemer -> AuthorisedScriptProofIndex
instance PlutusTx.IsData.Class.ToData Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.YieldingRedeemer
instance PlutusTx.IsData.Class.FromData Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.YieldingRedeemer
instance PlutusTx.IsData.Class.UnsafeFromData Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.YieldingRedeemer
instance Test.QuickCheck.Arbitrary.Arbitrary Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptIndex
instance PlutusTx.Eq.Eq Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptIndex

instance Test.QuickCheck.Arbitrary.Arbitrary Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptPurpose

module Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Optics
class HasYieldingRedeemer c_auhf
yieldingRedeemer :: HasYieldingRedeemer c_auhf => Lens' c_auhf YieldingRedeemer
authorisedScriptIndex :: HasYieldingRedeemer c_auhf => Lens' c_auhf AuthorisedScriptIndex
authorisedScriptProofIndex :: HasYieldingRedeemer c_auhf => Lens' c_auhf AuthorisedScriptProofIndex
instance Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Optics.HasYieldingRedeemer Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.YieldingRedeemer
instance forall t. ((Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptIndex :: GHC.Types.Type) GHC.Types.~ (t :: GHC.Types.Type)) => Control.Lens.Wrapped.Rewrapped Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptIndex t
instance Control.Lens.Wrapped.Wrapped Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptIndex
instance forall t. ((Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptProofIndex :: GHC.Types.Type) GHC.Types.~ (t :: GHC.Types.Type)) => Control.Lens.Wrapped.Rewrapped Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptProofIndex t
instance Control.Lens.Wrapped.Wrapped Cardano.YTxP.SDK.Redeemers.AuthorisedScriptProofIndex


module Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters

-- | Parameters available during compilation (therefore not containing any
--   script hashes).
data SdkParameters
SdkParameters :: [Natural] -> [Natural] -> [Natural] -> [Natural] -> [Natural] -> AuthorisedScriptsSTCS -> SdkParameters

-- | A list of nonces for the yielding staking validators. One staking
--   validator is compiled for each nonce. @since 0.1.0
[$sel:stakingValidatorsNonceList:SdkParameters] :: SdkParameters -> [Natural]

-- | A list of nonces for the yielding minting policies. One minting policy
--   is compiled for each nonce. @since 0.1.0
[$sel:mintingPoliciesNonceList:SdkParameters] :: SdkParameters -> [Natural]

-- | A list of nonces for the certifying staking validators. One certifying
--   validator is compiled for each nonce. @since 0.2.0
[$sel:certifyingValidatorsNonceList:SdkParameters] :: SdkParameters -> [Natural]

-- | A list of nonces for the voting staking validators. One voting
--   validator is compiled for each nonce. @since 0.2.0
[$sel:votingValidatorsNonceList:SdkParameters] :: SdkParameters -> [Natural]

-- | A list of nonces for the proposing staking validators. One proposing
--   validator is compiled for each nonce. @since 0.2.0
[$sel:proposingValidatorsNonceList:SdkParameters] :: SdkParameters -> [Natural]

-- | The Currency symbol of the token that identifies authorised reference
--   scripts . @since 0.1.0
[$sel:authorisedScriptsSTCS:SdkParameters] :: SdkParameters -> AuthorisedScriptsSTCS

-- | Semantic newtype for the YieldList state thread currency symbol
newtype AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
AuthorisedScriptsSTCS :: CurrencySymbol -> AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance Prettyprinter.Internal.Pretty Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance PlutusTx.Lift.Class.Lift PlutusCore.Default.Universe.DefaultUni Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance PlutusTx.Lift.Class.Typeable @GHC.Types.Type PlutusCore.Default.Universe.DefaultUni Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance PlutusTx.IsData.Class.UnsafeFromData Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance PlutusTx.IsData.Class.FromData Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance PlutusTx.IsData.Class.ToData Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance GHC.Show.Show Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.AuthorisedScriptsSTCS
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.SdkParameters
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Cardano.YTxP.SDK.SdkParameters.SdkParameters

-- | This module is consider deprecated. Use Ply instead.

-- | <i>Deprecated: Use Ply instead.</i>
module Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters

-- | Scripts that yield to transaction families identified by reference
--   scripts which carry a state thread token
data YieldingScripts
YieldingScripts :: [HexStringScript "YieldingMP"] -> HexStringScript "YieldingValidator" -> [HexStringScript "YieldingSV"] -> YieldingScripts

[$sel:yieldingMintingPolicies:YieldingScripts] :: YieldingScripts -> [HexStringScript "YieldingMP"]

[$sel:yieldingValidator:YieldingScripts] :: YieldingScripts -> HexStringScript "YieldingValidator"

[$sel:yieldingStakingValidators:YieldingScripts] :: YieldingScripts -> [HexStringScript "YieldingSV"]

-- | Contains the compiled scripts along with the parameters they were
--   compiled against. This is useful for _library consumers_ and should
--   contain all of the information needed to work with the library.
data ControlParameters
ControlParameters :: YieldingScripts -> SdkParameters -> ControlParameters

[$sel:yieldingScripts:ControlParameters] :: ControlParameters -> YieldingScripts

[$sel:sdkParameters:ControlParameters] :: ControlParameters -> SdkParameters

-- | A helper newtype to ensure that any <tt>Script</tt>s we use are
--   serialized (and deserialized), consistently. We also have a 'tag' for
--   a more specific type name or label when using a via derivation with
--   this, or as part of a larger type.
--   
--   See <tt>JSON.md</tt> for an explanation of our policy. TODO: update
--   json policy
newtype HexStringScript (scriptLabel :: Symbol)
HexStringScript :: ShortByteString -> HexStringScript (scriptLabel :: Symbol)

-- | Converts a <a>ShortByteString</a> into a textual representation in
--   hex.
sbsToHexText :: ShortByteString -> Text

-- | Attempts to parse the given <a>Text</a> into the
--   <a>ShortByteString</a> that would have produced it via
--   <a>sbsToHexText</a>, indicating parse failures with <a>fail</a>.
hexTextToSbs :: MonadFail m => Text -> m ShortByteString
instance forall (scriptLabel :: GHC.Types.Symbol). GHC.Classes.Eq (Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.HexStringScript scriptLabel)
instance GHC.Show.Show Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.YieldingScripts
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.YieldingScripts
instance GHC.Show.Show Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.ControlParameters
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.ControlParameters
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.ControlParameters
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.ControlParameters
instance Prettyprinter.Internal.Pretty Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.ControlParameters
instance Prettyprinter.Internal.Pretty Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.YieldingScripts
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.YieldingScripts
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.YieldingScripts
instance forall (scriptLabel :: GHC.Types.Symbol). Prettyprinter.Internal.Pretty (Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.HexStringScript scriptLabel)
instance forall (scriptLabel :: GHC.Types.Symbol). Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON (Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.HexStringScript scriptLabel)
instance forall (scriptLabel :: GHC.Types.Symbol). GHC.TypeLits.KnownSymbol scriptLabel => Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON (Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.HexStringScript scriptLabel)
instance forall (scriptLabel :: GHC.Types.Symbol). GHC.TypeLits.KnownSymbol scriptLabel => GHC.Show.Show (Cardano.YTxP.SDK.ControlParameters.HexStringScript scriptLabel)
